Module com.example.miniproyecto4
Package com.example.miniproyecto4.model.Utils

Class Constants

java.lang.Object
com.example.miniproyecto4.model.Utils.Constants
public class Constants extends Object
Utility class containing game constants for the Battleship game. Defines board dimensions, ship counts, ship sizes, and file paths. This class cannot be instantiated.
